price: 103. Tokkel firqawni Nabii Muusa yiskikkiqeeh kaa kee israa-iil xaylo Masri baaxok yayyaaqem faxe, tokkel Nanu kaa kee kay qandek kaâ luk sugtem inkih badal xuumusneeh ken bayisneh.
arabic: فَأَرَادَ أَن يَسۡتَفِزَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ جَمِيعٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-arāda an yastafizzahum mina al-arḍi fa-aghraqnāhu waman maʿahu jamīʿan
